memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *cameraId, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: ADPylon

parameterdescription.para: asyn port name to assign to the camera.
The camera index or serial number; <1000 is assumed to be index, >=1000 is assumed to be serial number.
Maximum memory (in bytes) that this driver is allowed to allocate. So if max. size = 1024x768 (8bpp) and maxBuffers is, say 14. maxMemory = 1024x768x14 = 11010048 bytes (~11MB). 0=unlimited.
The EPICS thread priority for this driver. 0=use asyn default.
The size of the stack for the EPICS port thread. 0=use asyn default.

briefdescription.para: Print out a report; calls ADDriver::report to get base class report as well.

parameterdescription.para: File pointer to write output to
Level of detail desired. If >1 prints information about supported video formats and modes, etc.

memberdef.argsstring: (GenICamFeatureSet *set, std::string const &asynName, asynParamType asynType, int asynIndex, std::string const &featureName, GCFeatureType_t featureType)
memberdef.name: createFeature

briefdescription.para: Connects driver to device; This method is called when the driver's pasynCommon->connect() function is called.

detaileddescription.para:
It uses the class variable deviceIsReachable to determine whether to call asynPortDriver::connect(), which in turn calls pasynManager::exceptionConnect() to signal that the driver is connected to the underlying hardware. Derived classes can override this method if they need to handle connect() calls in a more complex way. For example, with a network camera that can be temporarily unreachable the driver could attempt to connect to the camera each time that connect() is called.
pasynUser
The pasynUser structure which contains information about the port and address

briefdescription.para: Task to grab images off the camera and send them up to areaDetector.

detaileddescription.para: Here we close the camera connection and terminate the Pylon system.

briefdescription.para: Convert Pylon grab result data to areaDetector NDArray.
Called by Pylon when the camera is disconnected.

detaileddescription.para: Here we mark the device unreachable and any further read/write requests will be rejected.

briefdescription.para: Main driver class inherited from areaDetectors ADGenICam class.

detaileddescription.para: One instance of this class will control one camera.
